## CdkVirtualScrollPagingOptions interface

Cdk virtual scroll paging options

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CdkVirtualScrollPagingOptions extends PagingOptions<CssClassesCdkVirtualScrollPaging> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [loadPageTreshold](./grid-material.cdkvirtualscrollpagingoptions.loadpagetreshold.md) | <code>number</code> | Value between 0 and 1 which indicates scroll percentage, when to run loading next page if available |
